name: Depths Mining Co.
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

You play as Grover, a deep-sea miner for Depths Mining Co.

Mine your way to the bottom, and earn gold from precious materials. How deep can you go?

Made for Ludum Dare 48 (Theme: Deeper and deeper)

Music credits:

Wholesome by Kevin MacLeod

Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5050-wholesome

License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Night In Venice by Kevin MacLeod
